name: Pontifical University of St. Thomas Aquinas
former_names: ''Collegium Divi Thomæ'' (1577–1580); ''Collegium Divi Thomæ de Urbe'' (1580–1906); ''Pontificium Collegium Divi Thomæ de Urbe'' (1906–1908); ''Pontificium Collegium Internationale Angelicum'' (1908–1926); ''Pontificium Institutum Internationale Angelicum'' (1926–1942); ''Pontificium Athenaeum Internationale Angelicum'' (1942–1963)
